title: Transparency Log Entry v1
description: A single append-only entry in the tamper-evident transparency log.

run_id.description: Run ID of the sealed artifact.

commit_hash.description: Commit hash of the sealed artifact.

artifact_bytes_sha256.description: SHA-256 of the sealed artifact canonical bytes.

signing_key_id.description: Signing key ID used to sign the artifact.

prev_entry_hash.description: Hash of the previous log entry (null for first entry).

entry_hash.description: SHA-256 of this entry (with entry_hash set to empty string during computation).

observed_at.description: Wall-clock time when entry was appended.
